chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 12 product has the above problem:
The package was reshipped to the seller, so I would like to receive a refund.
Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

The customer refused the parcel and wishes a refund.

Please refund the amount.

Thank you

Regards,
Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the customer's request and we are currently processing the device. We seek your understanding in this.

Regards,
Xt
